    • setParts

      public void setParts(Part selectedParts)

      Parameters:

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Unused in Class, but part of the JavaFX GUI Lifecycle. When FXML is initiated, the default for the Radio Button will be set to Machine ID.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Unused in current controller.
      resourceBundle - Unused in current controller.

    • onModifySaveButtonClick

      public void onModifySaveButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Completes the Modification of the previously saved Part element. Validation checks on fields if they are empty as well as making sure Inv, Min, and Max are the appropriate numbers.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Unused in method.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onInhouseRadioSelect

      public void onInhouseRadioSelect(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      If the In House Radio button is selected, the ModifyVariableLabel will be changed to "Machine ID" and also wipe the field.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - caused by the User clicking on the Radio Button for "In House".

    • onOutsourcedRadioSelect

      public void onOutsourcedRadioSelect(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      If the Out Sourced Radio button is selected, the ModifyVariableLabel will be changed to "Company Name" and also wipe the field.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - caused by the User clicking on the Radio Button for "Out Sourced".

    • preventNonNumericalDataEntry

      public void preventNonNumericalDataEntry(String fieldName, Class dataType, javafx.scene.control.TextField textFieldUsed)
      Method used to validate numerical data in the Inventory, Min, Max and Machine ID Integer TextFields, as well as the Double data for Price. FUTURE_ENHANCEMENT: Future revisions will eliminate the use of try/catch as it seem ineligant a solution. Future Revisions will instead use Regular Expressions. To help parse if a field has a number of character. Also Regex will also be able to detect Tabs and avoid the warning Pop-Ups.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - The name of the respective Textfield to be validated.
      dataType - The data type used to be validated.
      textFieldUsed - The respective Textfield used.

    • onModifyInvFieldKeyTyped

      public void onModifyInvFieldKeyTyped(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyPress)
      Method used to insure ONLY Integer values in the Part Inv field. If a non-Integer/Number is entered a Pop-Up will warn user and clear field.
      Parameters:
      keyPress - Unused in Method.

    • ModifyMinFieldKeyTyped

      public void ModifyMinFieldKeyTyped(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyPress)
      Method used to insure ONLY Integer values in the Part Min field. If a non-Integer/Number is entered a Pop-Up will warn user and clear field.
      Parameters:
      keyPress - Unused in Method.

    • ModifyMaxFieldKeyTyped

      public void ModifyMaxFieldKeyTyped(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyPress)
      Method used to insure ONLY Integer values in the Part Max field. If a non-Integer/Number is entered a Pop-Up will warn user and clear field.
      Parameters:
      keyPress - Unused in Method.

    • onModifyPriceFieldKeyTyped

      public void onModifyPriceFieldKeyTyped(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Method used to insure ONLY Double values in the Part Price field. If a non-Doube/Number is entered a Pop-Up will warn user and clear field. FUTURE-ENHANCEMENT: Use of a REGEX to validate would be much better than using try/catch, it would also eliminate odd behaviors during data entry.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - Unused in Method.

    • onModifyVariableFieldKeyPressed

      public void onModifyVariableFieldKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Method used to insure ONLY Integer values in the Part Variable field when set on the Raido Button to "In House". If a non-Integer/Number is entered a Pop-Up will warn user and clear field.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - Unused in Method.
